Used to toggle BBE and all of its optimizations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.optimize.chest.t: Used to toggle chest optimizations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.optimize.shulker: Used to toggle shulker box optimizations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.optimize.sign.to: Used to toggle sign optimizations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.optimize.decorat: Used to toggle decorated pot optimizations ON or OFF
Used to toggle banner optimizations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.optimize.bell.to: Used to toggle bell optimizations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.optimize.bed.too: Used to toggle bed optimizations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.optimize.copper_: Used to toggle copper golem statue optimizations ON or OFF
Used to toggle chest animations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.animation.shulke: Used to toggle shulker box animations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.animation.bell.t: Used to toggle bell animations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.animation.decora: Used to toggle decorated pot animations ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.misc.banner_grap: Decides what renderpass banners should be rendered in, (Fast = cutout), (Fancy = Translucent)
bbe.config.storage.main.misc.christmas_c: Used to toggle Christmas textures ON or OFF for chests
bbe.config.storage.main.misc.render_pass: Decides how many extra render passes to keep a block entity in its animating state after animation finishes
bbe.config.storage.main.misc.sign_text.t: Used to toggle sign text rendering ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.misc.sign_text_d: Decides at what distance(blocks) to start rendering sign text at
bbe.config.storage.main.misc.sign_text_c: Skips rendering sign text on the side that isn't visible. Used to toggle sign text backface culling ON or OFF
bbe.config.storage.main.misc.update_sche: Decides what update scheduler to use, Smart updates block-entities based on several factors like visibility (no direct updates) while Fast updates immediately
This option is not available because the EMF mod is loaded!
